thread.title: Virginia mom discovers 800 ammo rounds in Toys 'R' Us order
thread.title_full: Virginia mom discovers 800 ammo rounds in Toys 'R' Us order - NY Daily News

author: NEW YORK DAILY NEWS
title: Virginia mom discovers 800 ammo rounds in Toys 'R' Us order
text:
13wmaz Jasemin Stephenson says she found 800 rounds of 9mm ammunition in the box along with the sword. A Virginia mom was stunned to find ammunition in her son’s Toys “R” Us delivery.
Jasemin Stephenson ordered a Minecraft ‘Foam Diamond Sword’ from the toy company’s website for her son Conor’s seventh birthday.
But when it arrived at her Virginia Beach home, she was shocked to discover 800 rounds of 9mm ammunition in the box along with the sword.
13wmaz The Virginia Beach mom says her son's safety was compromised by the unwanted delivery. “It was heavy – and when I opened it, there was a whole lot of ammo in there too,” Stephenson told WVEC-TV .
"It is very shocking. You are ordering from a Toys "R" Us store, you don't expect to get ammo in a box of toys.”
13wmaz Toys "R" Us are investigating how the ammo came to be packaged with the toy. Stephenson said that her child's safety was compromised and said the delivery was "very irresponsible, definitely on their part.”
The company said they are investigating how the ammo came to be packed with the toy.
In a statement, Toys “R” Us said: "We are in the process of looking into this matter with our shipping carrier to determine how this may have occurred.”
lhanna@nydailynews.com
